mailbox: namespace where all related indexes are stored

index.text key: All fields in this 'text' section will be split into key/value pairs where 'key' is attribute name ('attribute key', 'another key', 'text key' and so on) and 'value' is text strings split to tokens ('value', 'another', 'value' and so on). When searching one has to specify some attribute names and some of its values. Search and indexing are performed within 'mailbox' namespace.
